job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Information Services
job.description: <p>We are seeking a site reliability engineer (SRE) to build and manage highly reliable data platform infrastructure and applications. Specifically, we are searching for someone who brings fresh ideas, demonstrates a unique and informed viewpoint, and enjoys collaborating with world-class engineers to develop big data solutions and deliver positive user experiences at every interaction.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>RESPONSIBILITIES:</strong></p><ul><li>Build software and systems to manage platform infrastructure and applications</li><li>Continuous automation of operational processes</li><li>Provide primary operational support and engineering for suite of SaaS tools</li><li>Intervene and remediate when systems and services deviate significantly from normal levels</li><li>Work with release engineers to ensure that the software delivery pipeline is as efficient as possible</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>PREFERRED PROFILE:</strong></p><ul><li>3-5 years of relevant experience in operating</li><li>BS/MS in Computer science or equivalent</li><li>medium-scale distributed system in a cloud environment</li><li>Experience in Kubernetes, Hadoop and Docker containers</li><li>Experience in (CI/CD) - Jenkins, Concourse tools</li><li>Experience in AWS Cloud, Server-less technologies</li><li>Experience in building and deploying automation using scripting/ programming languages</li></ul><p></p>
